com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components

Class PhysicsBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.Component
      • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.PhysicsBody

  • public class PhysicsBody
extends Component
    The PhysicsBody is a component that gived physics to parent component in form of collision and gravity
